channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JCRVLT-579] CI/CD: Snapshot deployment fails with NPE
item.description:
The deployment to the Apache Nexus Snapshot repository fails with an NPE

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.8:deploy-staged (default-cli) on project filevault-package-maven-plugin: Failed to update metadata org.apache.jackrabbit/maven-metadata.xml: null: RepositoryException: NullPointerException -> [Help 1]

The reason is an error with the staging-maven-plugin reported at https://issues.sonatype.org/browse/NEXUS-30749
item.summary: CI/CD: Snapshot deployment fails with NPE

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Probably switching to the approach from https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/INFRA/Multibranch+Pipeline+recipes#MultibranchPipelinerecipes-DeployingArtifacts, i.e. using a regular maven-deploy-plugin to a local repo followed by either http://www.mojohaus.org/wagon-maven-plugin/upload-mojo.html or http://www.mojohaus.org/wagon-maven-plugin/merge-maven-repos-mojo.html.
